channel.title: Authentication on {code that works}

item.title: JWT authentication with Spring Web - Part 1
item.description: JSON Web Tokens (JWTs) are signed tokens issued by a server that it can use to verify a claim made by a client. This blog post is the first in a series where I implement authentication based on JWT in a Spring Web application with an Angular JS front end.
